data.news_body: Belrise Industries Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 16/06/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Belrise Industries Limited has informed the Exchange about Board Meeting to be held on 16 June-2025 to inter-alia consider and approve the audited financial both standalone and consolidated results of the Company for the quarter and year ended on 31st March 2025

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 (LODR) - Updated - Dissolution Of IPO Committee
data.news_body: The Company has intimated to the Exchange regarding dissolution of IPO committee w.e.f June 2 2025.

data.caption:
Intimation Under Regulation 30 (5) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing 
Obligations And Disclosure Requirements Regulations) 201
data.news_body: The Company has informed the exchange of the KMPs who are authorised to determine materiality or the purpose of making disclosure to the stock exchanges under Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR regulations

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: The Company has intimated to the exchange regarding closure of trading window for the adoption of standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and year ended on March 31 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Belrise Industries Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from May 28 2025 the equity shares of Belrise Industries Ltd (Scrip Code: 544405) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250527- dated May 27 2025.
